summary: The module provides a set of diffusion pipelines that transform textual prompts or existing images into amusing, humor‑styled visuals. It includes a core text‑to‑image pipeline, an image‑to‑image variant, and an inpainting pipeline, all of which coordinate tokenization, text encoding, latent diffusion, and VAE decoding while handling preprocessing and post‑processing.
business_intent: To empower developers and content creators with AI tools that can automatically generate comedic or entertaining images for marketing, social media, gaming, and creative applications, thereby reducing manual design effort and increasing audience engagement.
